Compile a TreePPL model and create inference machinery

Source: R/compile.R
tp_compile.Rd

tp_compile compile a TreePPL model and create inference machinery to be used by tp_run.

Usage

tp_compile(
  model,
  method,
  iterations = NULL,
  particles = NULL,
  dir = NULL,
  output = NULL,
  ...
)

Arguments

model

One of tree options:

  • The full path of the model file that contains the TreePPL code, OR

  • A string with the name of a model supported by treepplr (see tp_model_library()), OR

  • A string containing the entire TreePPL code.

method

Inference method to be used. See tp_compile_options() for all supported methods.

iterations

The number of MCMC iterations to be run.

particles

The number of SMC particles to be run.

dir

The directory where you want to save the executable. Default is base::tempdir()

output

Complete path to the compiled TreePPL program that will be created. Default is dir/.exe

...

See tp_compile_options() for all supported arguments.

Value

The path for the compiled TreePPL program.
